ayahs.arabic: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa hashara fanada

ayahs.arabic: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ اُ۬لۡأَعۡلٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Faqala ana rabbu kumul-a'laa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَخَذَهُ اُ۬للَّهُ نَكَالَ اَ۬لۡأٓخِرَةِ وَاَلۡأُولٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Fa-akha zahul laahu nakalal aakhirati wal-oola

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةࣰ لِّمَن يَخۡشٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Inna fee zaalika la'ibratal limaiy-yaksha

ayahs.arabic: ءَٰا۬نتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ اِ۬لسَّمَآءُۚ بَنٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: A-antum a shaddu khalqan amis samaa-u banaaha

ayahs.arabic: رَفَعَ سَمۡكَهَا فَسَوّٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Raf'a sam kaha fasaw waaha

ayahs.arabic: وَأَغۡطَشَ لَيۡلَهَا وَأَخۡرَجَ ضُحٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wa aghtasha lailaha wa akhraja duhaaha

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحٜ ىٰهَآ
ayahs.english: Wal arda b'ada zaalika dahaaha

ayahs.arabic: أَخۡرَجَ مِنۡهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرۡعٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Akhraja minha maa-aha wa mar 'aaha

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡجِبَالَ أَرۡسٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wal jibala arsaaha

ayahs.arabic: مَتَٰعࣰ ا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
ayahs.english: Mataa'al lakum wali an 'aamikum

ayahs.arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ اِ۬لطَّآمَّةُ اُ۬لۡكُبۡر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa-izaa jaaa'atit taaam matul kubraa

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ اُ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Yauma Yata zakkarul insaanu ma sa'aa

ayahs.arabic: وَبُرِّزَتِ اِ۬لۡجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa burrizatil-jaheemu limany-yaraa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
ayahs.english: Fa ammaa man taghaa

ayahs.arabic: وَءَاثَرَ اَ۬لۡحَيَوٰةَ اَ۬لدُّنۡيٜ ا
ayahs.english: Wa aasaral hayaatad dunyaa

ayahs.arabic: فَإِنَّ اَ۬لۡجَحِيمَ هِيَ اَ۬لۡمَأۡوٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa innal jaheema hiyal maawaa

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى اَ۬لنَّفۡسَ عَنِ اِ۬لۡهَوٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa ammaa man khaafa maqaama Rabbihee wa nahan nafsa 'anil hawaa

ayahs.arabic: فَإِنَّ اَ۬لۡجَنَّةَ هِيَ اَ۬لۡمَأۡوٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa innal jannata hiyal maawaa

ayahs.arabic: ۞يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ اِ۬لسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرۡسٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Yas'aloonaka 'anis saa'ati ayyaana mursaahaa

ayahs.arabic: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكۡر۪ىٰهَآ
ayahs.english: Feema anta min zikraahaa

ayahs.arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهٜ ىٰهَآ
ayahs.english: Ilaa Rabbika muntahaa haa

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخۡشٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Innamaaa anta munziru maiy yakshaahaa

ayahs.arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Ka annahum Yawma yarawnahaa lam yalbasooo illaa 'ashiyyatan aw duhaahaa

ayahs.arabic: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلّٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Abasa wa tawallaa

ayahs.arabic: أَن جَآءَهُ اُ۬لۡأَعۡمٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: An jaa-ahul 'a-maa

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكّٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Wa maa yudreeka la'allahu yaz zakkaa

ayahs.arabic: أَوۡ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعُهُ اُ۬لذِّكۡر۪يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Au yaz zak karu fatanfa 'ahuz zikraa

ayahs.arabic: أَمَّا مَنِ اِ۪سۡتَغۡنٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Amma manis taghnaa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa-anta lahu tasaddaa

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيۡكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa ma 'alaika allaa yaz zakka

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسۡعٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa amma man jaa-aka yas'a

ayahs.arabic: وَهۡوَ يَخۡشٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wahuwa yakhshaa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَنتَ عَنۡهُ تَلَهّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa-anta 'anhu talah haa

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذۡكِرَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Kalla innaha tazkirah

ayahs.arabic: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Faman shaa a zakarah

ayahs.arabic: فِي صُحُفࣲ مُّكَرَّمَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Fi suhufim mukar rama

ayahs.arabic: مَّرۡفُوعَةࣲ مُّطَهَّرَةِۢ
ayahs.english: Marfoo'atim mutah hara

ayahs.arabic: بِأَيۡدِي سَفَرَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Bi'aidee safara

ayahs.arabic: كِرَامِۢ بَرَرَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Kiraamim bararah

ayahs.arabic: قُتِلَ اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكۡفَرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Qutilal-insanu maa akfarah

ayahs.arabic: مِنۡ أَيِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Min aiyyi shai-in Khalaq

ayahs.arabic: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Min nutfah; khalaqahu faqad-darah

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ اَ۬لسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Thummas sabeela yas-sarah

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقۡبَرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Thumma amatahu fa-aqbarah

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآ أَنشَرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Thumma iza shaa-a ansharah

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقۡضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Kalla lamma yaqdi maa amarah

ayahs.arabic: فَلۡيَنظُرِ اِ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
ayahs.english: Falyanzuril insanu ilaa ta-amih

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّا صَبَبۡنَا اَ۬لۡمَآءَ صَبࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Anna sabab nalmaa-a sabba

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ شَقَقۡنَا اَ۬لۡأَرۡضَ شَقࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Thumma sha qaqnal-arda shaqqa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا حَبࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Fa ambatna feeha habba

ayahs.arabic: وَعِنَبࣰ ا وَقَضۡبࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Wa 'inabaw-wa qadba

ayahs.arabic: وَزَيۡتُونࣰ ا وَنَخۡلࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Wa zaitoonaw wanakh la

ayahs.arabic: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلۡبࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Wa hadaa-iqa ghulba

ayahs.arabic: وَفَٰكِهَةࣰ وَأَبࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Wa faki hataw-wa abba

ayahs.arabic: مَّتَٰعࣰ ا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
ayahs.english: Mata'al-lakum wa li-an'amikum

ayahs.arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ اِ۬لصَّآخَّةُ
ayahs.english: Faiza jaa-atis saakhah

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمَ يَفِرُّ اُ۬لۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِيهِ
ayahs.english: Yauma yafir-rul mar-u min akheeh

ayahs.arabic: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
ayahs.english: Wa ummihee wa abeeh

ayahs.arabic: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
ayahs.english: Wa sahi batihee wa baneeh

ayahs.arabic: لِكُلِّ اِ۪مۡرِيࣲٕ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ شَأۡنࣱ يُغۡنِيهِ
ayahs.english: Likul limri-im-minuhm yaumaa-izin shaa nuy-yughneeh

ayahs.arabic: ۞وُجُوهࣱ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ مُّسۡفِرَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wujoo huny-yauma-izim-musfira

ayahs.arabic: ضَاحِكَةࣱ مُّسۡتَبۡشِرَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Dahi katum mustab shirah

ayahs.arabic: وَوُجُوهࣱ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَلَيۡهَا غَبَرَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wa wujoohuy yauma-izin 'alaiha ghabar a

ayahs.arabic: تَرۡهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
ayahs.english: Tarhaquha qatarah

ayahs.arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ اُ۬لۡكَفَرَةُ اُ۬لۡفَجَرَةُ
ayahs.english: Ulaa-ika humul-kafa ratul-fajarah

ayahs.arabic: إِذَا اَ۬لشَّمۡسُ كُوِّرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Izash shamsu kuwwirat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لنُّجُومُ اُ۪نكَدَرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izan nujoomun kadarat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal jibaalu suyyirat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal 'ishaaru 'uttilat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal wuhooshu hushirat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡبِحَارُ سُجِرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal bihaaru sujjirat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izan nufoosu zuwwijat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡمَوۡءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal maw'oodatu su'ilat

ayahs.arabic: بِأَيِّ ذَنۢبࣲ قُتِلَتۡ
ayahs.english: Bi ayyi zambin qutilat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لصُّحُفُ نُشِّرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izas suhufu nushirat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izas samaaa'u kushitat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡجَحِيمُ سُعِرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal jaheemu su'-'irat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡجَنَّةُ أُزۡلِفَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal jannatu uzlifat

ayahs.arabic: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسࣱ مَّآ أَحۡضَرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Alimat nafsum maaa ahdarat

ayahs.arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِالۡخُنَّسِ
ayahs.english: Falaaa uqsimu bil khunnas

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لۡجَوَارِ اِ۬لۡكُنَّسِ
ayahs.english: Al jawaaril kunnas

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّيۡلِ إِذَا عَسۡعَسَ
ayahs.english: Wallaili izaa 'as'as

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلصُّبۡحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
ayahs.english: Wassubhi izaa tanaffas

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولࣲ كَرِيمࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Innahoo laqawlu rasoolin kareem

ayahs.arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي اِ۬لۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Zee quwwatin 'inda zil 'arshi makeen

ayahs.arabic: مُّطَاعࣲ ثَمَّ أَمِينࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Mutaa'in samma ameen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجۡنُونࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Wa maa saahibukum bimajnoon

ayahs.arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَء۪اهُ بِالۡأُفُقِ اِ۬لۡمُبِينِ
ayahs.english: Wa laqad ra aahu bilufuqil mubeen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى اَ۬لۡغَيۡبِ بِضظَنِينࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Wa maa huwa 'alal ghaibi bidaneen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَيۡطَٰنࣲ رَّجِيمࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Wa maa huwa biqawli shaitaanir rajeem

ayahs.arabic: فَأَيۡنَ تَذۡهَبُونَ
ayahs.english: Fa ayna tazhaboon

ayahs.arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرࣱ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.english: In huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen

ayahs.arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَسۡتَقِيمَ
ayahs.english: Liman shaaa'a minkum ai yastaqeem

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ اَ۬للَّهُ رَبُّ اُ۬لۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.english: Wa maa tashaaa'oona illaaa ai yashaaa 'al laahu Rabbul 'Aalameen

ayahs.arabic: إِذَا اَ۬لسَّمَآءُ اُ۪نفَطَرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Izas samaaa'un fatarat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡكَوَاكِبُ اُ۪نتَثَرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal kawaakibun tasarat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal bihaaru fujjirat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡقُبُورُ بُعۡثِرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal qubooru bu'sirat

ayahs.arabic: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسࣱ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ
ayahs.english: Alimat nafsum maa qaddamat wa akhkharat

ayahs.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ اَ۬لۡكَرِيمِ
ayahs.english: Yaaa ayyuhal insaaanu maa gharraka bi Rabbikal kareem

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَّلَكَ
ayahs.english: Allazee khalaqaka fasaw waaka fa'adalak

ayahs.arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةࣲ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
ayahs.english: Feee ayye sooratim maa shaaa'a rakkabak

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
ayahs.english: Kalla bal tukazziboona bid deen

ayahs.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
ayahs.english: Wa inna 'alaikum lahaa fizeen

ayahs.arabic: كِرَامࣰ ا كَٰتِبِينَ
ayahs.english: Kiraaman kaatibeen

ayahs.arabic: يَعۡلَمُونَ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
ayahs.english: Ya'lamoona ma taf'aloon

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Innal abraara lafee na'eem

ayahs.arabic: وَإِنَّ اَ۬لۡفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Wa innal fujjaara lafee jaheem

ayahs.arabic: يَصۡلَوۡنَهَا يَوۡمَ اَ۬لدِّينِ
ayahs.english: Yaslawnahaa Yawmad Deen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
ayahs.english: Wa maa hum 'anhaa bighaaa 'ibeen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ اُ۬لدِّينِ
ayahs.english: Wa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Deen

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ اُ۬لدِّينِ
ayahs.english: Summa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Deen

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمُ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسࣱ لِّنَفۡسࣲ شَيۡـࣰٔ اۖ وَاَلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلَّهِ
ayahs.english: Yawma laa tamliku nafsul linafsin shai'anw walamru yawma'izil lillaah

ayahs.arabic: وَيۡلࣱ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ
ayahs.english: Wailul lil mutaffifeen

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِينَ إِذَا اَ۪كۡتَالُواْ عَلَى اَ۬لنّ۪اسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
ayahs.english: Allazeena izak taaloo 'alan naasi yastawfoon

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِرُونَ
ayahs.english: Wa izaa kaaloohum aw wazanoohum yukhsiroon

ayahs.arabic: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ
ayahs.english: Alaa yazunnu ulaaa'ika annahum mab'oosoon

ayahs.arabic: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Li Yawmin 'Azeem

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ اُ۬لنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ اِ۬لۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.english: Yawma yaqoomun naasu li Rabbil 'aalameen

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ اَ۬لۡفُجّ۪ارِ لَفِي سِجِّينࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Kallaaa inna kitaabal fujjaari lafee Sijjeen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wa maa adraaka maa Sijjeen

ayahs.arabic: كِتَٰبࣱ مَّرۡقُومࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Kitaabum marqoom

ayahs.arabic: وَيۡلࣱ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.english: Wailuny yawma'izil lil mukazzibeen

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ اِ۬لدِّينِ
ayahs.english: Allazeena yukazziboona bi yawmid deen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
ayahs.english: Wa maa yukazzibu biheee illaa kullu mu'tadin aseem

ayahs.arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ اُ۬لۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.english: Izaa tutlaa'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل رَّانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayahs.english: Kallaa bal raana 'alaa quloobihim maa kaanoo yaksiboon

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
ayahs.english: Kallaaa innahum 'ar Rabbihim yawma'izil lamah jooboon

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ اُ۬لۡجَحِيمِ
ayahs.english: Summa innahum lasaa lul jaheem

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا اَ۬لَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.english: Summa yuqaalu haazal lazee kuntum bihee tukazziboon

ayahs.arabic: ۞كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ اَ۬لۡأَبۡر۪ارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
ayahs.english: Kallaaa inna kitaabal abraari lafee'Illiyyeen

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
ayahs.english: Wa maaa adraaka maa 'Illiyyoon

ayahs.arabic: كِتَٰبࣱ مَّرۡقُومࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Kitaabum marqoom

ayahs.arabic: يَشۡهَدُهُ اُ۬لۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
ayahs.english: Yashhadu hul muqarra boon

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
ayahs.english: Innal abraara lafee Na'eem

ayahs.arabic: عَلَى اَ۬لۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayahs.english: Alal araaa'iki yanzuroon

ayahs.arabic: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ اَ۬لنَّعِيمِ
ayahs.english: Ta'rifu fee wujoohihim nadratan na'eem

ayahs.arabic: يُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِيقࣲ مَّخۡتُومٍ
ayahs.english: Yusqawna mir raheeqim makhtoom

ayahs.arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكࣱۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ اِ۬لۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
ayahs.english: Khitaamuhoo misk; wa fee zaalika falyatanaafasil Mutanaafisoon

ayahs.arabic: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِيمٍ
ayahs.english: Wa mizaajuhoo min Tasneem

ayahs.arabic: عَيۡنࣰ ا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا اَ۬لۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
ayahs.english: Ainaiy yashrabu bihal muqarraboon

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
ayahs.english: Innal lazeena ajramoo kaanoo minal lazeena aamanoo yadhakoon

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
ayahs.english: Wa izaa marroo bihim yataghaamazoon

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۪نقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمِ اِ۪نقَلَبُواْ فَٰكِهِينَ
ayahs.english: Wa izan qalabooo ilaaa ahlihimun qalaboo fakiheen

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
ayahs.english: Wa izaa ra awhum qaalooo inna haaa'ulaaa'i ladaaal loon

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayahs.english: Wa maaa ursiloo 'alaihim haafizeen

ayahs.arabic: فَاَلۡيَوۡمَ اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ اَ۬لۡكُفّ۪ارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
ayahs.english: Fal yawmal lazeena aamanoo minal kuffaari yadhakoon

ayahs.arabic: عَلَى اَ۬لۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayahs.english: Alal araaa'iki yanzuroon

ayahs.arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ اَ۬لۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayahs.english: Hal suwwibal kuffaaru maa kaanoo yaf'aloon

ayahs.arabic: إِذَا اَ۬لسَّمَآءُ اُ۪نشَقَّتۡ
ayahs.english: Izas samaaa'un shaqqat

ayahs.arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا اَ۬لۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa izal ardu muddat

ayahs.arabic: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa alqat maa feehaa wa takhallat

ayahs.arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat

ayahs.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحࣰ ا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
ayahs.english: Yaaa ayyuhal insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa Rabbika kad han famulaaqeeh

ayahs.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
ayahs.english: Fa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenih

ayahs.arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابࣰ ا يَسِيرࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Fasawfa yuhaasabu hi saabai yaseeraa

ayahs.arabic: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Wa yanqalibu ilaaa ahlihee masrooraa

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
ayahs.english: Wa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo waraaa'a zahrih

ayahs.arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Fasawfa yad'oo subooraa

ayahs.arabic: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
ayahs.english: Wa yaslaa sa'eeraa

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا
ayahs.english: Innahoo kaana feee ahlihee masrooraa

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
ayahs.english: Innahoo zanna al lai yahoor

ayahs.arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Balaaa inna Rabbahoo kaana bihee baseeraa

ayahs.arabic: ۞فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
ayahs.english: Falaaa uqsimu bishshafaq

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّيۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
ayahs.english: Wallaili wa maa wasaq

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا اَ۪تَّسَقَ
ayahs.english: Walqamari izat tasaq

ayahs.arabic: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Latarkabunna tabaqan 'an tabaq

ayahs.arabic: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayahs.english: Famaa lahum laa yu'minoon

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمِ اِ۬لۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
ayahs.english: Wa izaa quri'a 'alaihimul Quraanu laa yasjudoon

ayahs.arabic: بَلِ اِ۬لَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.english: Balil lazeena kafaroo yukazziboon

ayahs.arabic: وَاَللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
ayahs.english: Wallaahu a'lamu bimaa yoo'oon

ayahs.arabic: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayahs.english: Fabashshirhum bi'azaabin aleem

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ اُ۬لصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۢ
ayahs.english: Illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ اِ۬لۡبُرُوجِ
ayahs.english: Wassamaaa'i zaatil burooj

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡيَوۡمِ اِ۬لۡمَوۡعُودِ
ayahs.english: Wal yawmil maw'ood

ayahs.arabic: وَشَاهِدࣲ وَمَشۡهُودࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Wa shaahidinw wa mashhood

ayahs.arabic: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَٰبُ اُ۬لۡأُخۡدُودِ
ayahs.english: Qutila as haabul ukhdood

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لنّ۪ارِ ذَاتِ اِ۬لۡوَقُودِ
ayahs.english: Annaari zaatil waqood

ayahs.arabic: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Iz hum 'alaihaa qu'ood

ayahs.arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِالۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wa hum 'alaa maa yaf'aloona bilmu 'mineena shuhood

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِاللَّهِ اِ۬لۡعَزِيزِ اِ۬لۡحَمِيدِ
ayahs.english: Wa maa naqamoo minhum illaaa aiyu'minoo billaahil 'azeezil Hameed

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ اُ۬لسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَاَلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَاَللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءࣲ شَهِيدٌ
ayahs.english: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai 'in Shaheed

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ اُ۬لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَاَلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ اُ۬لۡحَرِيقِ
ayahs.english: Innal lazeena fatanul mu'mineena wal mu'minaati summa lam yatooboo falahum 'azaabu Jahannama wa lahum 'azaabul hareeq

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ اُ۬لصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتࣱ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا اَ۬لۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ اَ۬لۡفَوۡزُ اُ۬لۡكَبِيرُ
ayahs.english: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum Jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; zaalikal fawzul kabeer

ayahs.arabic: ۞إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
ayahs.english: Inna batsha Rabbika lashadeed

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
ayahs.english: Innahoo Huwa yubdi'u wa yu'eed

ayahs.arabic: وَهۡوَ اَ۬لۡغَفُورُ اُ۬لۡوَدُودُ
ayahs.english: Wa Huwal Ghafoorul Wadood

ayahs.arabic: ذُو اُ۬لۡعَرۡشِ اِ۬لۡمَجِيدُ
ayahs.english: Zul 'Arshil Majeed

ayahs.arabic: فَعَّالࣱ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
ayahs.english: Fa' 'aalul limaa yureed

ayahs.arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ اُ۬لۡجُنُودِ
ayahs.english: Hal ataaka hadeesul junood

ayahs.arabic: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ
ayahs.english: Fir'awna wa Samood

ayahs.arabic: بَلِ اِ۬لَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Balil lazeena kafaroo fee takzeeb

ayahs.arabic: وَاَللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ
ayahs.english: Wallaahu minw waraaa'ihim muheet

ayahs.arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانࣱ مَّجِيدࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Bal huwa Quraanum Majeed

ayahs.arabic: فِي لَوۡحࣲ مَّحۡفُوظِۢ
ayahs.english: Fee Lawhim Mahfooz

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلسَّمَآءِ وَاَلطَّارِقِ
ayahs.english: Wassamaaa'i wattaariq

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا اَ۬لطَّارِقُ
ayahs.english: Wa maaa adraaka mattaariq

ayahs.arabic: اُ۬لنَّجۡمُ اُ۬لثَّاقِبُ
ayahs.english: Annajmus saaqib

ayahs.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسࣲ لَّمَا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظࣱ‏
ayahs.english: In kullu nafsil lammaa 'alaihaa haafiz

ayahs.arabic: فَلۡيَنظُرِ اِ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
ayahs.english: Fal yanzuril insaanu mimma khuliq

ayahs.arabic: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءࣲ دَافِقࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Khuliqa mim maaa'in daafiq

ayahs.arabic: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ اِ۬لصُّلۡبِ وَاَلتَّرَآئِبِ
ayahs.english: Yakhruju mim bainissulbi wat taraaa'ib

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Innahoo 'alaa raj'ihee laqaadir

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى اَ۬لسَّرَآئِرُ
ayahs.english: Yawma tublas saraaa'ir

ayahs.arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةࣲ وَلَا نَاصِرࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Famaa lahoo min quwwatinw wa laa naasir

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ اِ۬لرَّجۡعِ
ayahs.english: Wassamaaa'i zaatir raj

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ اِ۬لصَّدۡعِ
ayahs.english: Wal ardi zaatis sad

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلࣱ فَصۡلࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Innahoo laqawlun fasl

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِالۡهَزۡلِ
ayahs.english: Wa maa huwa bil hazl

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Innahum yakeedoona kaidaa

ayahs.arabic: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Wa akeedu kaidaa

ayahs.arabic: فَمَهِّلِ اِ۬لۡكٰ۪فِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا
ayahs.english: Famahhilil kaafireena amhilhum ruwaidaa

ayahs.arabic: سَبِّحِ اِ۪سۡمَ رَبِّكَ اَ۬لۡأَعۡلَى
ayahs.english: Sabbihisma Rabbikal A'laa

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Allazee khalaqa fasawwaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wallazee qaddara fahadaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ اَ۬لۡمَرۡعٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wallazeee akhrajal mar'aa

ayahs.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Faja'alahoo ghusaaa'an ahwaa

ayahs.arabic: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Sanuqri'uka falaa tansaaa

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ اَ۬للَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ اُ۬لۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Illaa maa shaaa'al laah; innahoo ya'lamul jahra wa maa yakhfaa

ayahs.arabic: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa nu-yassiruka lilyusraa

ayahs.arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ اِ۬لذِّكۡر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Fazakkir in nafa'atizzikraa

ayahs.arabic: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Sa yazzakkaru maiyakhshaa

ayahs.arabic: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا اَ۬لۡأَشۡقَى
ayahs.english: Wa yatajannabuhal ashqaa

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِي يَصۡلَى اَ۬لنَّارَ اَ۬لۡكُبۡر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Allazee yaslan Naaral kubraa

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Summa laa yamootu feehaa wa laa yahyaa

ayahs.arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Qad aflaha man tazakkaa

ayahs.arabic: وَذَكَرَ اَ۪سۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa zakaras ma Rabbihee fasallaa

ayahs.arabic: بَلۡ يُؤۡثِرُونَ اَ۬لۡحَيَوٰةَ اَ۬لدُّنۡيٜ ا
ayahs.english: Bal tu'siroonal hayaatad dunyaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرࣱ وَأَبۡقٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Wal Aakhiratu khairunw wa abqaa

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي اِ۬لصُّحُفِ اِ۬لۡأُولٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Inna haazaa lafis suhu fil oolaa

ayahs.arabic: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Suhufi Ibraaheema wa Moosaa

ayahs.arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ اُ۬لۡغَٰشِيَةِ
ayahs.english: Hal ataaka hadeesul ghaashiyah

ayahs.arabic: وُجُوهࣱ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
ayahs.english: Wujoohuny yawma 'izin khaashi'ah

ayahs.arabic: عَامِلَةࣱ نَّاصِبَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Aamilatun naasibah

ayahs.arabic: تُصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةࣰ‏
ayahs.english: Taslaa naaran haamiyah

ayahs.arabic: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Tusqaa min 'aynin aaniyah

ayahs.arabic: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Laisa lahum ta'aamun illaa min daree

ayahs.arabic: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Laa yusminu wa laa yughnee min joo

ayahs.arabic: وُجُوهࣱ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ نَّاعِمَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wujoohuny yawma 'izin naa'imah

ayahs.arabic: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Lisa'yihaa raadiyah

ayahs.arabic: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Fee jannatin 'aaliyah

ayahs.arabic: لَّا يُسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Laa tasma'u feehaa laaghiyah

ayahs.arabic: فِيهَا عَيۡنࣱ جَارِيَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Feehaa 'aynun jaariyah

ayahs.arabic: فِيهَا سُرُرࣱ مَّرۡفُوعَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Feehaa sururum marfoo'ah

ayahs.arabic: وَأَكۡوَابࣱ مَّوۡضُوعَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wa akwaabum mawdoo 'ah

ayahs.arabic: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wa namaariqu masfoofah

ayahs.arabic: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ
ayahs.english: Wa zaraabiyyu mabsoosah

ayahs.arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى اَ۬لۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ
ayahs.english: Afalaa yanzuroona ilalibili kaifa khuliqat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِلَى اَ۬لسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa ilas samaaa'i kaifa rufi'at

ayahs.arabic: وَإِلَى اَ۬لۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa ilal jibaali kaifa nusibat

ayahs.arabic: وَإِلَى اَ۬لۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ
ayahs.english: Wa ilal ardi kaifa sutihat

ayahs.arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Fazakkir innama anta Muzakkir

ayahs.arabic: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ
ayahs.english: Lasta 'alaihim bimusaitir

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
ayahs.english: Illaa man tawallaa wa kafar

ayahs.arabic: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اُ۬للَّهُ اُ۬لۡعَذَابَ اَ۬لۡأَكۡبَرَ
ayahs.english: Fa yu'azzibuhul laahul 'azaabal akbar

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ
ayahs.english: Innaa ilainaaa iyaabahum

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم
ayahs.english: Summa inna 'alainaa hisaabahum

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡفَجۡرِ
ayahs.english: Wal-Fajr

ayahs.arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Wa layaalin 'ashr

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلشَّفۡعِ وَاَلۡوَتۡرِ
ayahs.english: Wash shaf'i wal watr

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِۦ
ayahs.english: Wallaili izaa yasr

ayahs.arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمࣱ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
ayahs.english: Hal fee zaalika qasamul lizee hijr

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
ayahs.english: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi'aad

ayahs.arabic: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ اِ۬لۡعِمَادِ
ayahs.english: Iramaa zaatil 'imaad

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي اِ۬لۡبِلَٰدِ
ayahs.english: Allatee lam yukhlaq misluhaa fil bilaad

ayahs.arabic: وَثَمُودَ اَ۬لَّذِينَ جَابُواْ اُ۬لصَّخۡرَ بِالۡوَادِ
ayahs.english: Wa samoodal lazeena jaabus sakhra bil waad

ayahs.arabic: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي اِ۬لۡأَوۡتَادِ
ayahs.english: Wa fir'awna zil awtaad

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي اِ۬لۡبِلَٰدِ
ayahs.english: Allazeena taghaw fil bilaad

ayahs.arabic: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا اَ۬لۡفَسَادَ
ayahs.english: Fa aksaroo feehal fasaad

ayahs.arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ
ayahs.english: Fasabba 'alaihim Rabbuka sawta 'azaab

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالۡمِرۡصَادِ
ayahs.english: Inna Rabbaka labil mirsaad

ayahs.arabic: فَأَمَّا اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا اَ۪بۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيَ أَكۡرَمَنِۦ
ayahs.english: Fa ammal insaanu izaa mab talaahu Rabbuhoo fa akramahoo wa na' 'amahoo fa yaqoolu Rabbeee akraman

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا اَ۪بۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيَ أَهَٰنَنِۦ
ayahs.english: Wa ammaaa izaa mabtalaahu faqadara 'alaihi rizqahoo fa yaqoolu Rabbeee ahaanan

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا يُكۡرِمُونَ اَ۬لۡيَتِيمَ
ayahs.english: Kalla bal laa tukrimooo nal yateem

ayahs.arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ اِ۬لۡمِسۡكِينِ
ayahs.english: Wa laa tahaaaddoona 'alaata'aamil miskeen

ayahs.arabic: وَيَأۡكُلُونَ اَ۬لتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلࣰ ا لَّمࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Wa taakuloonat turaasa aklal lammaa

ayahs.arabic: وَيُحِبُّونَ اَ۬لۡمَالَ حُبࣰّ ا جَمࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Wa tuhibboonal maala hubban jammaa

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ اِ۬لۡأَرۡضُ دَكࣰّ ا دَكࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Kallaaa izaaa dukkatil ardu dakkan dakka

ayahs.arabic: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَاَلۡمَلَكُ صَفࣰّ ا صَفࣰّ ا
ayahs.english: Wa jaaa'a Rabbuka wal malaku saffan saffaa

ayahs.arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۢ بِجَهَنَّمَ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ يَتَذَكَّرُ اُ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنّٜ يٰ لَهُ اُ۬لذِّكۡر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa jeee'a yawma'izim bi jahannnam; Yawma 'iziny yatazakkarul insaanu wa annaa lahuz zikraa

ayahs.arabic: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي
ayahs.english: Yaqoolu yaa laitanee qaddamtu lihayaatee

ayahs.arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذࣲ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Fa Yawma izil laa yu'azzibu 'azaabahooo ahad

ayahs.arabic: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wa laa yoosiqu wasaaqa hooo ahad

ayahs.arabic: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا اَ۬لنَّفۡسُ اُ۬لۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ
ayahs.english: Yaaa ayyatuhan nafsul mutma 'innah

ayahs.arabic: اُ۪رۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةࣰ مَّرۡضِيَّةࣰ‏
ayahs.english: Irji'eee ilaa Rabbiki raadiyatam mardiyyah

ayahs.arabic: فَاَدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي
ayahs.english: Fadkhulee fee 'ibaadee

ayahs.arabic: وَاَدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي
ayahs.english: Wadkhulee jannatee

ayahs.arabic: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا اَ۬لۡبَلَدِ
ayahs.english: Laaa uqsimu bihaazal balad

ayahs.arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا اَ۬لۡبَلَدِ
ayahs.english: Wa anta hillum bihaazal balad

ayahs.arabic: وَوَالِدࣲ وَمَا وَلَدَ
ayahs.english: Wa waalidinw wa maa walad

ayahs.arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ
ayahs.english: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee kabad

ayahs.arabic: أَيَحۡسِبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Ayahsabu al-lai yaqdira 'alaihi ahad

ayahs.arabic: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالࣰ ا لُّبَدًا
ayahs.english: Yaqoolu ahlaktu maalal lubadaa

ayahs.arabic: أَيَحۡسِبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
ayahs.english: Ayahsabu al lam yarahooo ahad

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ
ayahs.english: Alam naj'al lahoo 'aynayn

ayahs.arabic: وَلِسَانࣰ ا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ
ayahs.english: Wa lisaananw wa shafatayn

ayahs.arabic: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ اُ۬لنَّجۡدَيۡنِ
ayahs.english: Wa hadaynaahun najdayn

ayahs.arabic: فَلَا اَ۪قۡتَحَمَ اَ۬لۡعَقَبَةَ
ayahs.english: Falaq tahamal-'aqabah

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا اَ۬لۡعَقَبَةُ
ayahs.english: Wa maaa adraaka mal'aqabah

ayahs.arabic: فَكَّ رَقَبَةً
ayahs.english: Fakku raqabah

ayahs.arabic: أَوۡ أَطۡعَمَ فِي يَوۡمࣲ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Aw it'aamun fee yawmin zee masghabah

ayahs.arabic: يَتِيمࣰ ا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ
ayahs.english: Yateeman zaa maqrabah

ayahs.arabic: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينࣰ ا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Aw miskeenan zaa matrabah

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِالصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِالۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
ayahs.english: Summa kaana minal lazeena aamanoo wa tawaasaw bissabri wa tawaasaw bilmarhamah

ayahs.arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ اُ۬لۡمَيۡمَنَةِ
ayahs.english: Ulaaa'ika As-haabul maimanah

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ اُ۬لۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
ayahs.english: Wallazeena kafaroo bi aayaatinaa hum as-haabul Mash'amah

ayahs.arabic: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارࣱ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ
ayahs.english: Alaihim naarum mu'sadah

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wash shamsi wa duhaa haa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wal qamari izaa talaa haa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلنَّه۪ارِ إِذَا جَلّٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wannahaari izaa jallaa haa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wallaili izaa yaghshaa haa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wassamaaa'i wa maa banaahaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wal ardi wa maa tahaahaa

ayahs.arabic: وَنَفۡسࣲ وَمَا سَوّٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wa nafsinw wa maa sawwaahaa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Fa-alhamahaa fujoorahaa wa taqwaahaa

ayahs.arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكّٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Qad aflaha man zakkaahaa

ayahs.arabic: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسّٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Wa qad khaaba man dassaahaa

ayahs.arabic: كَذَّبَت ثَّمُودُ بِطَغۡوٜ ىٰهَآ
ayahs.english: Kazzabat Samoodu bi taghwaahaaa

ayahs.arabic: إِذِ اِ۪نۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Izim ba'asa ashqaahaa

ayahs.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ اُ۬للَّهِ نَاقَةَ اَ۬للَّهِ وَسُقۡيٰٜهَا
ayahs.english: Faqaala lahum Rasoolul laahi naaqatal laahi wa suqiyaahaa

ayahs.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوّٜ ىٰهَا
ayahs.english: Fakazzaboohu fa'aqaroohaa fadamdama 'alaihim Rabbuhum bizambihim fasaw waahaa

ayahs.arabic: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبٰٜهَا
ayahs.english: Wa laa yakhaafu'uqbaahaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wallaili izaa yaghshaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلنَّه۪ارِ إِذَا تَجَلّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wannahaari izaa tajalla

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ اَ۬لذَّكَرَ وَاَلۡأُنثٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Wa maa khalaqaz zakara wal unthaa

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Inna sa'yakum lashattaa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَاَتَّقٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa ammaa man a'taa wattaqaa

ayahs.arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِالۡحُسۡنٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa saddaqa bil husnaa

ayahs.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Fasanu yassiruhoo lilyusraa

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَاَسۡتَغۡنٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa ammaa mam bakhila wastaghnaa

ayahs.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِالۡحُسۡنٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa kazzaba bil husnaa

ayahs.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Fasanu yassiruhoo lil'usraa

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدّٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Wa maa yughnee 'anhu maaluhooo izaa taraddaa

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Inna 'alainaa lal hudaa

ayahs.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَاَلۡأُولٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa inna lanaa lal Aakhirata wal oolaa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارࣰ ا تَلَظّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Fa anzartukum naaran talazzaa

ayahs.arabic: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا اَ۬لۡأَشۡقَى
ayahs.english: Laa yaslaahaaa illal ashqaa

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Allazee kazzaba wa tawallaa

ayahs.arabic: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا اَ۬لۡأَتۡقَى
ayahs.english: Wa sa yujannnabuhal atqaa

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكّٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Allazee yu'tee maalahoo yatazakkaa

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةࣲ تُجۡزٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Wa maa li ahadin 'indahoo min ni'matin tujzaaa

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا اَ۪بۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ اِ۬لۡأَعۡلٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Illab tighaaa'a wajhi rabbihil a 'laa

ayahs.arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa lasawfa yardaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلضُّحٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wad duhaa

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wal laili iza sajaa

ayahs.arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Ma wad da'aka rabbuka wa ma qalaa

ayahs.arabic: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرࣱ لَّكَ مِنَ اَ۬لۡأُولٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Walal-aakhiratu khairul laka minal-oola

ayahs.arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Wa la sawfa y'uteeka rabbuka fatarda

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمࣰ ا فَـَٔاوٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Alam ya jidka yateeman fa aawaa

ayahs.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلࣰّ ا فَهَدٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa wa jadaka daal lan fahada

ayahs.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلࣰ ا فَأَغۡنٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Wa wa jadaka 'aa-ilan fa aghnaa

ayahs.arabic: فَأَمَّا اَ۬لۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ
ayahs.english: Fa am mal yateema fala taqhar

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا اَ۬لسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ
ayahs.english: Wa am mas saa-ila fala tanhar

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ
ayahs.english: Wa amma bi ni'mati rabbika fahad dith

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ
ayahs.english: Alam nashrah laka sadrak

ayahs.arabic: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ
ayahs.english: Wa wa d'ana 'anka wizrak

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ
ayahs.english: Allazee anqada zahrak

ayahs.arabic: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ
ayahs.english: Wa raf 'ana laka zikrak

ayahs.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ اَ۬لۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا
ayahs.english: Fa inna ma'al usri yusra

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ اَ۬لۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Inna ma'al 'usri yusra

ayahs.arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَاَنصَبۡ
ayahs.english: Fa iza faragh ta fansab

ayahs.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَاَرۡغَب
ayahs.english: Wa ilaa rabbika far ghab

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلتِّينِ وَاَلزَّيۡتُونِ
ayahs.english: Wat teeni waz zaitoon

ayahs.arabic: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
ayahs.english: Wa toori sineen

ayahs.arabic: وَهَٰذَا اَ۬لۡبَلَدِ اِ۬لۡأَمِينِ
ayahs.english: Wa haazal balad-il ameen

ayahs.arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fee ahsani taqweem

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
ayahs.english: Thumma ra dad naahu asfala saafileen

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ اُ۬لصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Ill-lal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati; falahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon

ayahs.arabic: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِالدِّينِ
ayahs.english: Fama yu kaz zibuka b'adu bid deen

ayahs.arabic: أَلَيۡسَ اَ۬للَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ اِ۬لۡحَٰكِمِينَ
ayahs.english: Alai sal laahu bi-ahkamil haakimeen

ayahs.arabic: اِ۪قۡرَأۡ بِاسۡمِ رَبِّكَ اَ۬لَّذِي خَلَقَ
ayahs.english: Iqra bismi rab bikal lazee khalaq

ayahs.arabic: خَلَقَ اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ
ayahs.english: Khalaqal insaana min 'alaq

ayahs.arabic: اِ۪قۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ اَ۬لۡأَكۡرَمُ
ayahs.english: Iqra wa rab bukal akram

ayahs.arabic: اُ۬لَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالۡقَلَمِ
ayahs.english: Al lazee 'allama bil qalam

ayahs.arabic: عَلَّمَ اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ
ayahs.english: Al lamal insaana ma lam y'alam

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Kallaa innal insaana layatghaa

ayahs.arabic: أَن رَّء۪اهُ اُ۪سۡتَغۡنٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Ar-ra aahus taghnaa

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ اَ۬لرُّجۡعٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Innna ilaa rabbikar ruj'aa

ayahs.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ اَ۬لَّذِي يَنۡهٜ يٰ
ayahs.english: Ara-aital lazee yanhaa

ayahs.arabic: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلّٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Abdan iza sallaa

ayahs.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى اَ۬لۡهُدٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Ara-aita in kana 'alal hudaa

ayahs.arabic: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقۡوٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Au amara bit taqwaa

ayahs.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلّٜ يٰٓ
ayahs.english: Ara-aita in kaz zaba wa ta walla

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ اَ۬للَّهَ يَر۪يٰ
ayahs.english: Alam y'alam bi-an nal lahaa yaraa

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
ayahs.english: Kalla la illam yantahi la nasfa'am bin nasiyah

ayahs.arabic: نَاصِيَةࣲ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Nasiyatin kazi batin khaatiyah

ayahs.arabic: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Fal yad'u naadiyah

ayahs.arabic: سَنَدۡعُ اُ۬لزَّبَانِيَةَ
ayahs.english: Sanad 'uz zabaaniyah

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَاَسۡجُدۡۤ وَاَقۡتَرِب۩
ayahs.english: Kalla; la tuti'hu wasjud waqtarib

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ اِ۬لۡقَدۡرِ
ayahs.english: Innaa anzalnaahu fee lailatil qadr

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ اُ۬لۡقَدۡرِ
ayahs.english: Wa maa adraaka ma lailatul qadr

ayahs.arabic: لَيۡلَةُ اُ۬لۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرࣱ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Lailatul qadri khairum min alfee shahr

ayahs.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ اُ۬لۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَاَلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Tanaz zalul malaa-ikatu war roohu feeha bi izni-rab bihim min kulli amr

ayahs.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ اِ۬لۡفَجۡرِ
ayahs.english: Salaamun hiya hattaa mat la'il fajr

ayahs.arabic: لَمۡ يَكُنِ اِ۬لَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ اِ۬لۡكِتَٰبِ وَاَلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ اُ۬لۡبَيِّنَةُ
ayahs.english: Lam ya kunil lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal mushri keena mun fak keena hattaa ta-tiya humul bayyinah

ayahs.arabic: رَسُولࣱ مِّنَ اَ۬للَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفࣰ ا مُّطَهَّرَةࣰ‏
ayahs.english: Rasoolum minal laahi yatlu suhufam mutahharah

ayahs.arabic: فِيهَا كُتُبࣱ قَيِّمَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Feeha kutubun qaiyimah

ayahs.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ اَ۬لَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ اُ۬لۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ اُ۬لۡبَيِّنَةُ
ayahs.english: Wa maa tafarraqal lazeena ootul kitaaba il-la mim b'adi ma jaa-at humul baiyyinah

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُواْ اُ۬للَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ اُ۬لدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُواْ اُ۬لصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُواْ اُ۬لزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ اُ۬لۡقَيِّمَةِ
ayahs.english: Wa maa umiroo il-la liy'abu dul laaha mukhliseena lahud-deena huna faa-a wa yuqeemus salaahta wa yu-tuz zakaata; wa zaalika deenul qaiyimah

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ اِ۬لۡكِتَٰبِ وَاَلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِي ن۪ارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ اُ۬لۡبَرِيَّةِ
ayahs.english: Innal lazeena kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal mushri keena fee nari jahan nama khaali deena feeha; ulaa-ika hum shar rul ba reeyah

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ اُ۬لصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ اُ۬لۡبَرِيَّةِ
ayahs.english: Innal lazeena aamanu wa 'amilus saalihaati ula-ika hum khairul bareey yah

ayahs.arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنࣲ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا اَ۬لۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدࣰ اۖ رَّضِيَ اَ۬للَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ
ayahs.english: Jazaa-uhum inda rabbihim jan naatu 'adnin tajree min tahtihal an haaru khalideena feeha abada; radiy-yallaahu 'anhum wa ra du 'an zaalika liman khashiya rabbah

ayahs.arabic: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ اِ۬لۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا
ayahs.english: Izaa zul zilatil ardu zil zaalaha

ayahs.arabic: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ اِ۬لۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا
ayahs.english: Wa akh rajatil ardu athqaalaha

ayahs.arabic: وَقَالَ اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
ayahs.english: Wa qaalal insaanu ma laha

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمَئِذࣲ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا
ayahs.english: Yawmaa izin tuhad dithu akhbaaraha

ayahs.arabic: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا
ayahs.english: Bi-anna rabbaka awhaa laha

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمَئِذࣲ يَصۡدُرُ اُ۬لنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتࣰ ا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
ayahs.english: Yawma iziy yas durun naasu ash tatal liyuraw a'maalahum

ayahs.arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرࣰ ا يَرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Famaiy ya'mal mithqala zarratin khai raiy-yarah

ayahs.arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةࣲ شَرࣰّ ا يَرَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Wa maiy-y'amal mithqala zarratin sharraiy-yarah

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبۡحࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Wal'aadi yaati dabha

ayahs.arabic: فَاَلۡمُورِيَٰتِ قَدۡحࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Fal moori yaati qadha

ayahs.arabic: فَاَلۡمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبۡحࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Fal mugheeraati subha

ayahs.arabic: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Fa atharna bihee naq'a

ayahs.arabic: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا
ayahs.english: Fawa satna bihee jam'a

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Innal-insana lirabbihee lakanood

ayahs.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Wa innahu 'alaa zaalika la shaheed

ayahs.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ اِ۬لۡخَيۡرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
ayahs.english: Wa innahu lihubbil khairi la shadeed

ayahs.arabic: ۞أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي اِ۬لۡقُبُورِ
ayahs.english: Afala ya'lamu iza b'uthira ma filquboor

ayahs.arabic: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي اِ۬لصُّدُورِ
ayahs.english: Wa hussila maa fis sudoor

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذࣲ لَّخَبِيرُۢ
ayahs.english: Inna rabbahum bihim yauma 'izil la khabeer

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لۡقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.english: Al qaari'ah

ayahs.arabic: مَا اَ۬لۡقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.english: Mal qaariah

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا اَ۬لۡقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.english: Wa maa adraaka mal qaari'ah

ayahs.arabic: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ اُ۬لنَّاسُ كَاَلۡفَرَاشِ اِ۬لۡمَبۡثُوثِ
ayahs.english: Yauma ya koonun naasu kal farashil mabthooth

ayahs.arabic: وَتَكُونُ اُ۬لۡجِبَالُ كَاَلۡعِهۡنِ اِ۬لۡمَنفُوشِ
ayahs.english: Wa ta koonul jibalu kal 'ihnil manfoosh

ayahs.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
ayahs.english: Fa-amma man thaqulat mawa zeenuh

ayahs.arabic: فَهۡوَ فِي عِيشَةࣲ رَّاضِيَةࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Fahuwa fee 'ishatir raadiyah

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
ayahs.english: Wa amma man khaffat mawa zeenuh

ayahs.arabic: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Fa-ummuhu haawiyah

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا هِيَهۡ
ayahs.english: Wa maa adraaka maa hiyah

ayahs.arabic: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ
ayahs.english: Naarun hamiyah

ayahs.arabic: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ اُ۬لتَّكَاثُرُ
ayahs.english: Al haaku mut takathur

ayahs.arabic: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ اُ۬لۡمَقَابِرَ
ayahs.english: Hatta zurtumul-maqaabir

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayahs.english: Kalla sawfa ta'lamoon

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayahs.english: Thumma kalla sawfa ta'lamoon

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ اَ۬لۡيَقِينِ
ayahs.english: Kalla law ta'lamoona 'ilmal yaqeen

ayahs.arabic: لَتَرَوُنَّ اَ۬لۡجَحِيمَ
ayahs.english: Latara-wun nal jaheem

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيۡنَ اَ۬لۡيَقِينِ
ayahs.english: Thumma latara wunnaha 'ainal yaqeen

ayahs.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ اِ۬لنَّعِيمِ
ayahs.english: Thumma latus alunna yauma-izin 'anin na'eem

ayahs.arabic: وَاَلۡعَصۡرِ
ayahs.english: Wal' asr

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ اَ۬لۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ
ayahs.english: Innal insaana lafee khusr

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا اَ۬لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ اُ۬لصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِالۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِالصَّبۡرِ
ayahs.english: Il lal lazeena aamanu wa 'amilus saali haati wa tawa saw bil haqqi wa tawa saw bis sabr

ayahs.arabic: وَيۡلࣱ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةࣲ لُّمَزَةٍ
ayahs.english: Wai lul-li kulli hu mazatil-lumaza

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالࣰ ا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Al-lazi jama'a maalaw wa'addadah

ayahs.arabic: يَحۡسِبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ
ayahs.english: Yahsabu anna maalahu akhladah

ayahs.arabic: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي اِ۬لۡحُطَمَةِ
ayahs.english: Kalla layum ba zanna fil hutamah

ayahs.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡر۪ىٰكَ مَا اَ۬لۡحُطَمَةُ
ayahs.english: Wa maa adraaka mal-hutamah

ayahs.arabic: نَارُ اُ۬للَّهِ اِ۬لۡمُوقَدَةُ
ayahs.english: Narul laahil-mooqada

ayahs.arabic: اُ۬لَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى اَ۬لۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ
ayahs.english: Al latee tat tali'u 'alalafidah

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّهَا عَلَيۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةࣱ‏
ayahs.english: Innaha 'alaihim moosada

ayahs.arabic: فِي عَمَدࣲ مُّمَدَّدَةِۢ
ayahs.english: Fee 'amadim-mu mad dadah

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ اِ۬لۡفِيلِ
ayahs.english: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi ashaabil feel

ayahs.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Alam yaj'al kai dahum fee tad leel

ayahs.arabic: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ
ayahs.english: Wa arsala 'alaihim tairan abaabeel

ayahs.arabic: تَرۡمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةࣲ مِّن سِجِّيلࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Tar meehim bi hi jaaratim min sij jeel

ayahs.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفࣲ مَّأۡكُولِۢ
ayahs.english: Faja 'alahum ka'asfim m'akool

ayahs.arabic: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ
ayahs.english: Li-ilaafi quraish

ayahs.arabic: إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ اَ۬لشِّتَآءِ وَاَلصَّيۡفِ
ayahs.english: Elaafihim rihlatash shitaa-i wass saif

ayahs.arabic: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا اَ۬لۡبَيۡتِ
ayahs.english: Fal y'abudu rabba haazal-bait

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعࣲ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۢ
ayahs.english: Allazi at'amahum min ju'inw-wa-aamana hum min khawf

ayahs.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ اَ۬لَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
ayahs.english: Ara-aital lazee yu kazzibu bid deen

ayahs.arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ اَ۬لَّذِي يَدُعُّ اُ۬لۡيَتِيمَ
ayahs.english: Fa zaalikal lazi yadu'ul-yateem

ayahs.arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ اِ۬لۡمِسۡكِينِ
ayahs.english: Wa la ya huddu 'alaa ta'amil miskeen

ayahs.arabic: فَوَيۡلࣱ لِّلۡمُصَلِّينَ
ayahs.english: Fa wai lul-lil mu salleen

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ
ayahs.english: Al lazeena hum 'an salaatihim sahoon

ayahs.arabic: اَ۬لَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ
ayahs.english: Al lazeena hum yuraa-oon

ayahs.arabic: وَيَمۡنَعُونَ اَ۬لۡمَاعُونَ
ayahs.english: Wa yamna'oonal ma'oon

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡطَيۡنَٰكَ اَ۬لۡكَوۡثَرَ
ayahs.english: Innaa a'taina kal kauthar

ayahs.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَاَنۡحَرۡ
ayahs.english: Fa salli li rabbika wanhar

ayahs.arabic: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ اَ۬لۡأَبۡتَرُ
ayahs.english: Inna shani-aka huwal abtar

ayahs.arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا اَ۬لۡكَٰفِرُونَ
ayahs.english: Qul yaa-ai yuhal kaafiroon

ayahs.arabic: لَآ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
ayahs.english: Laa a'budu ma t'abudoon

ayahs.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ
ayahs.english: Wa laa antum 'aabidoona maa a'bud

ayahs.arabic: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدࣱ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ
ayahs.english: Wa laa ana 'abidum maa 'abattum

ayahs.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ
ayahs.english: Wa laa antum 'aabidoona ma a'bud

ayahs.arabic: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِي دِينِ
ayahs.english: Lakum deenukum wa liya deen

ayahs.arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ اُ۬للَّهِ وَاَلۡفَتۡحُ
ayahs.english: Iza jaa-a nas rullahi walfath

ayahs.arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ اَ۬لنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اِ۬للَّهِ أَفۡوَاجࣰ ا
ayahs.english: Wa ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajah

ayahs.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَاَسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
ayahs.english: Fa sab bih bihamdi rabbika was taghfir, innahu kaana tawwaaba

ayahs.arabic: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبࣲ وَتَبَّ
ayahs.english: Tab bat yadaa abee Lahabinw-wa tabb

ayahs.arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayahs.english: Maa aghna 'anhu maaluhu wa ma kasab

ayahs.arabic: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارࣰ ا ذَاتَ لَهَبࣲ‏
ayahs.english: Sa yas laa naran zaata lahab

ayahs.arabic: وَاَمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةُ اُ۬لۡحَطَبِ
ayahs.english: Wam ra-atuh hamma latal-hatab

ayahs.arabic: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلࣱ مِّن مَّسَدِۢ
ayahs.english: Fee jeediha hab lum mim-masad

ayahs.arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ اَ۬للَّهُ أَحَدٌ
ayahs.english: Qul huwal laahu ahad

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬للَّهُ اُ۬لصَّمَدُ
ayahs.english: Allah hus-samad

ayahs.arabic: لَمۡ يَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ يُولَدۡ
ayahs.english: Lam yalid wa lam yoolad

ayahs.arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُؤًا أَحَدُۢ
ayahs.english: Wa lam yakul-lahu kufuwan ahad

ayahs.arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ اِ۬لۡفَلَقِ
ayahs.english: Qul a'uzoo bi rabbil-falaq

ayahs.arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
ayahs.english: Min sharri ma khalaq

ayahs.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
ayahs.english: Wa min sharri ghasiqin iza waqab

ayahs.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ اِ۬لنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِي اِ۬لۡعُقَدِ
ayahs.english: Wa min sharrin-naffaa-thaati fil 'uqad

ayahs.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
ayahs.english: Wa min shar ri haasidin iza hasad

ayahs.arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ اِ۬لنّ۪اسِ
ayahs.english: Qul a'uzu birabbin naas

ayahs.arabic: مَلِكِ اِ۬لنّ۪اسِ
ayahs.english: Malikin naas

ayahs.arabic: إِلَٰهِ اِ۬لنّ۪اسِ
ayahs.english: Ilaahin naas

ayahs.arabic: مِن شَرِّ اِ۬لۡوَسۡوَاسِ اِ۬لۡخَنَّاسِ
ayahs.english: Min sharril was waasil khannaas

ayahs.arabic: اِ۬لَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ اِ۬لنّ۪اسِ
ayahs.english: Al lazee yuwas wisu fee sudoorin naas

ayahs.arabic: مِنَ اَ۬لۡجِنَّةِ وَاَلنّ۪اسِ
ayahs.english: Minal jinnati wan naas
